SELECT total, nf, institution_ch from v_stat_hcauthors_count
country_ch='中国' AND nf >= #{startYear} AND nf <= #{endYear} and institution_ch is not NULL

SELECT ANY_VALUE(country_ch) AS jgmc, SUM(total) AS rc FROM v_stat_hcauthors_count
1 = 1
AND category_ch = #{query.fields}
AND category_ch IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY country_ch ORDER BY rc DESC

SELECT ANY_VALUE(nf) AS nf, SUM(total) AS rc FROM v_stat_hcauthors_count
1 = 1
AND category_ch = #{query.fields}
AND category_ch IS NOT NULL
AND country_ch = #{query.affiliation}
AND country_ch IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY nf ORDER BY nf

SELECT a.field AS field, a.rc AS down, IFNULL(b.rc,0) AS up FROM ( SELECT ANY_VALUE(category_ch) AS field, SUM(total) AS rc FROM v_stat_hcauthors_count
category_ch IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY category_ch ) AS a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ANY_VALUE(category_ch) AS field, SUM(total) AS rc FROM v_stat_hcauthors_count
category_ch IS NOT NULL
AND country_ch = #{query.affiliation}
AND country_ch IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY category_ch ) AS b ON a.field = b.field ORDER BY a.rc DESC
